Description: Ostracon, fragment (two pieces joined) of the shoulder-section of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, exterior covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as 'oil in exchange (?) [..] ship's captain Ipy'.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393409) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393409)
